title.narrative: Kenya Elections and Political Processes Strengthening Program

description.narrative: Kenya Election and Political Process Strengthening Activity (KEPPS). RAAO to issue an Associate Award under the CEPPS III mechanism for the implementation of a 3-year election and political processes strengthening program

participating-org.narrative: Consortium for Elections and Political Process Strengthening
